title: Ore ga Inmajutsu de Dorei Harem wo Tsukuru Hanashi
original_name: 俺が淫魔術で奴隷ハーレムを作る話
sinopse:
A man was summoned to another world inhabited by angels, demons, humans and demi-humans. He was told by the demon-race to collect magical power, and the method of collection he chose was "rape"...

What will become of the girls who fall into a slave training...?

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou)
